name: Dharma Treasure
description: Tibetan Scriptures: Dharma Treasure presently contains over 300 traditional Tibetan. Portrait as well as landscape mode are supported. Texts are immediately reformatted according to orientation. On tablets in landscape mode scriptures are presented in traditional pecha format.  Dharma Teachings: Several Dharma teachings and advice by most outstanding masters in English are included. Oral teachings in English, Tibetan and German can be downloaded and played off-line
